title: East of the Sun, West of the Moon (Rabbit Ears, Cassette)
description: Max von Sydow dramatically retells this traditional Scandinavian tale of a young girl who, in order to reclaim her lost love, enlists the four winds to travel to the castle that lies East of the Sun and West of the Moon. The exquisite musical score is provided by award-winning composer Lyle Mays. Audio cassette and full color story poster included.
author: Max von Sydow
